divs: Sighting DetailsMy husband walked outside on front porch yelled for me to get my camera . 3 red orbs in sky big triangle . They changed their shape into a straight line a fourth red orb appeared , they split up moving around each other . One stood still , the other 3 went back into a triangle formation . As I started to take a picture with my digital camera the triangle stoped moving.One orb grew bigger pulsing red and then my camera just powered off. Tried to turn it back on and it would not do anything.We watched as the triangle looked as if it wasn't going up but down till we couldn't see it . The fourth orb that was not in triangle flashed and zipped at very very high speed across the sky and was gone.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Decatur
This sighting has never been favorited.
